Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Immunostimulant/BCI Immune Activator
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A purified Keyhole Limpet Hemocyanin, a potent antigenic protein capable of eliciting both humoral and cellular immune responses against tumor cells.
